name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Solutions Engineer with 13+ years of extensive experience in **AI**, **automation**, and **cloud computing**. Adept at deploying robust solutions on **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GoogleCloud**, and proficient in integrating **B2B** and **SaaS** applications, including CRM platforms like **Salesforce** and **HubSpot**. Strong command over **REST** and **GraphQL** APIs, ensuring seamless communication between applications and effective data exchanges.

Specialized in developing **Conversational AI** and RPA solutions, enhancing automation and user experience. Proven ability to build intelligent systems that leverage machine learning for real-time processing and predictive analytics. Excellent relationship-building and presentation skills, facilitating effective collaboration with stakeholders across diverse teams.

Technically skilled in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, **Flutter**, as well as frontend and backend frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Experienced in MLOps practices for model training and orchestration utilizing tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. Committed to compliance-driven development, aligning solutions with industry standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2.

experience.responsibilities:
• Developed AI-driven solutions for B2B applications, ensuring seamless integration with **Salesforce**, **HubSpot**, and other SaaS platforms, enhancing client relationship management and automation capabilities.
• Designed and built RESTful and GraphQL APIs to facilitate efficient data exchange and real-time interactions across various applications, supporting robust cloud deployment in **AWS** and **Azure** environments.
• Leveraged **NLP** technologies to enhance conversational AI features within applications, improving user experience and client engagement metrics by **15%**.
• Automated workflows and processes using **RPA** techniques, resulting in a **30%** increase in operational efficiency within cross-functional teams.
• Delivered presentations and training sessions on new automation tools, fostering strong communication and relationship-building skills within the organization.
• Collaborated closely with product teams to define and deliver tailored solutions that meet unique customer requirements while addressing market demands. 
• Implemented cloud infrastructure strategies leveraging **GoogleCloud**, ensuring scalability and reliability in service delivery, with a focus on cost-efficiency leading to a **20%** reduction in operational expenses.
• Provided ongoing support and integration of AI features, such as customer insights tools powered by advanced machine learning algorithms, enhancing the overall product offering.
• Consistently monitored system performance and user feedback, facilitating rapid testing and iteration to achieve increased user satisfaction scores by **25%**.

Utilized **cloud** services such as **Azure** and **AWS** to design and deploy scalable solutions in a **B2B** environment, streamlining financial processes and enhancing system performance.
Implemented **automation** strategies using **RPA** tools to improve efficiency and reduce manual workloads, achieving a time savings of **30%** in data processing tasks.
Integrated **AI** algorithms for fraud detection within financial transactions, utilizing frameworks like scikit-learn and XGBoost, resulting in a **25%** decrease in fraudulent activities.
Developed conversational interfaces employing **NLP** capabilities to enhance user experience for financial clients, resulting in a **15%** increase in user engagement.
Built and maintained a modern SaaS platform utilizing **Node.js (NestJS/Express)** and **Python (FastAPI, Django)** that improved system scalability to handle **1M+** transactions per day.
Created impactful presentation materials and conducted training to enhance client relationships and onboarding processes, fostering strong ties with stakeholders through effective communication.
Leveraged **REST** and **GraphQL** APIs to facilitate seamless data interchange between systems and external services like **Salesforce** and **HubSpot**, improving integration efficiency by **40%**.
Designed interactive dashboards using **Power BI** and data visualization tools like **D3.js**, providing operations teams with crucial insights and reducing anomaly detection time by **50%**.
Implemented an event-driven architecture with **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, ensuring reliable asynchronous communication across systems, aiding in compliance and payment processing workflows.

- Designed and optimized solutions for scalable **cloud** applications in **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GoogleCloud**, enhancing performance and reliability in a **B2B** e-commerce environment.
- Developed **AI** and **NLP** driven automation tools for personalized customer interactions and improved service efficiency, ensuring seamless integration with **Salesforce** and **HubSpot**.
- Engineered automated workflows leveraging **RPA** for streamlining operational processes, reducing manual tasks and boosting productivity by **30%**.
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams to create and implement **REST** and **GraphQL** APIs, improving data communication and service integration by **25%**.
- Implemented robust customer relationship strategies, enhancing relationship-building initiatives, and increasing customer retention rates by **15%**.
- Created comprehensive documentation and delivered presentations to stakeholders, showcasing solutions and improving communication across teams.
- Managed project timelines and deliverables, utilizing agile methodologies to ensure timely and efficient project execution.
- Fostered a collaborative team environment, actively participating in brainstorming sessions and contributing to the continuous improvement of services offered.
- Spearheaded cloud migration initiatives that resulted in a **40%** reduction in operational costs while maintaining high service levels.
